sentences.sContent: The coma duration prognostication model can prognosticate the duration of coma.
sentences.sContent_eng: The coma duration prognostication model can prognosticate the duration of coma.
sentences.sCn: 结论：昏迷时间预测模型可为临床提供昏迷时间预测。

remMethod.val: pro(提前) + gno(知道) + stic + ate → 预示

trans.tranOther: to foretell (future events) according to present signs or indications; prophesy
